title: Toxic ? Trash talking ? Healthy gaming experience?
body:
I do not know why trash talking it forbidden in game .

When someone is trash , they are trash , they deserves to be called a trash. 

No matter how patient a player trying to teach a better decision making mindset , trash's brain just can't process it . It end up laught and teasing me as a feeder where they just farm the whole game in the  jg as a no ganking jg , staying back in teamfight as a tank , adc farming minions when tank is diving in turrent for a kill.

Riot said trash talking in irl is not right to do so in irl and so does online

Riot , in real life , there are rich ppl ripping off employee , they just don't need to trash talk . They hire them ,buy their time with money to humiluate them .

Why can they do that ? Because they are strong , the whole world is about survival of the finess  . If you protect the prey and kill the predators , the whole eco system is gonna fall . 

It is so hard to get a balanced fight where adrenaline is rushing though your body , each of the team is 50/50 . Most of the time is either i solo carry all the way (which is boring ) or team is feeding (which is also boring ) . This situation is becoming more and more series kn season 6 . It is clearly something wrong with the matchmaking.

Btw , i am quitting , it is too stressful to lose every game even tho i did not feed . It is too stressful to type and try to teach people nicely where they just say you're dumb . The dumb community itself is just turning nice player to toxic players . People have their limits , playing this game is generating more stress than other things in my life . (eg, uni and gf etc) 

Quit asap if you want , don't waste your time and your opptunity cost
